means: 缺乏创造性的，枯燥无味的

sentence.Network_en: His works show an uncreative imagination.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的作品缺乏创造性的想像力.

sentence.Network_en: This restlessness and for adventure is, for the most, and illusory, because it is uncreative.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种不安定性的冒险的渴望, 在极大程度上是无聊的虚幻的, 因为它缺乏创造性.

sentence.Network_en: This repetitive and uncreative task bored her, so she decided to start her own business.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种重复又毫无创意的工作让她厌烦, 所以她决定开创自己的事业.

PerfectNetExp.abs: This repetitive and uncreative task bored her , so she decided to start her own business ., 这种重复又毫无创意的工作让她厌烦 , 所以她决定开创自己的事业.
this restlessness and thirst for adventure is , for the most part , barren and illusory , because it is uncreative .这种不安定性的冒险的渴望，在极大程度上是无聊的虚幻的，因为它缺乏创造性。
if you define the problem too narrowly , your possible solutions may be very limited and uncreative .如果你把问题定义得太狭隘，可能只会找到一些很局限的、没有创造性的方案。
... backer( 支持者) uncreative( 缺乏创造力的) undo( 还原).

auth_sentence.content: Which I find very unproductive and uncreative.

auth_sentence.content: " But she notes, with sympathy, that "many men look to dressing in a tuxedo as uncreative, like connecting the dots.

auth_sentence.content: He told me hearing me batting away made him feel uncreative, when he was struggling to put words on paper!
